popup_settings_position_caption.message: Select position of panel by horizontal and select position of tail by horizontal and vertical

get_started_begin.message: To get started, enter a word into the search box and click on any dictionary icon on the panel.

get_started_select.message: You can also look up words you select on web pages. To look up the selected word:

get_started_select_step1.message: open the menu by right-clicking on it and find the Mimic dictionary

get_started_select_step2.message: either choose the dictionary from the list or click on “the add word” option to be taken to the panel

faq_show_panel_answer.message: To unfold the panel, click on the tail with an arrow on the right or the left of the screen.

faq_unpin_panel_question.message: How to disable the panel for other web pages?

faq_unpin_panel_answer.message: To hide the panel on other web pages, set the unpin position at the bottom of the panel.

faq_keep_open_question.message: How to keep the panel open?

faq_keep_open_answer.message: To keep the panel open on any web page, pin it by clicking the pin icon at the bottom of the panel.

faq_open_new_tab_question.message: How to open a dictionary site in a new tab?

faq_open_new_tab_answer.message: To do this, click on the icon next to the dictionary button.

faq_change_position_question.message: How to change the position of the panel on the screen?

faq_change_position_answer.message: To choose the position of the search panel and of the tail, click on the position preferred in the layout in the Settings.

faq_change_theme_question.message: How do I switch the theme from light to dark?

faq_change_theme_answer.message: To switch the dark theme on, move the slider forward in the Settings.

faq_reorder_question.message: How do I reorder the dictionaries on the panel?

faq_reorder_answer.message: To change the order of the dictionaries on the panel, go to the Dictionaries tab, click on the dictionary you’d like to replace and drag it where needed.

faq_disable_question.message: How to disable the search panel?

faq_disable_answer.message: To disable the search panel, move the slider back in the Settings.

contact_glad.message: We glad if Mimic help you!
